entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of showers early this evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early in the evening then 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the evening. Snow level 2300 metres lowering to valley bottom in the evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Tuesday 25 April 2023
